column1: Wildberry Pancakes and Cafe////Adding to the annoyance
column2: I'm gluten-free and paleo/low-carb and they charge a buck extra for side salad. Why is that? A pile of leaves can't cost them more than hashbrowns
column4: or fruit. It's clearly not about the buck for either me or Wildberry
column5: but we fall squarely on opposite sides of "the principle of the thing".
